column4: Any improvements to Intrepid since release?  I'd like to convert my family PC from XP.  I know hardy works perfectly but am considering Intrepid.  Is it too early? have the "teething problems" been sorted?  Thanks for your input.
What are you looking to upgrade to Intrepid for?  There's nothing wrong with sticking to Hardy until 2010 (or until something comes out in Ubuntu you absolutely need)
That's the main reason I'd stick.  "if it ain't broke, don't fix it"
